page.title: 17Survey:Children, OAPs & Pets
page.content: The results here show the effect of sending survey forms home with children aged 5yrs to 11yrs! ___!_______!________!_________!!_____! AGE! 0-5yr ! 5-11yr ! 12-18yr !! OAP ! ___!_______!________!_________!!_____! NO.! 72 ! 249 ! 92 !! 12 ! ___!_______!________!_________!!_____! There were 22 different pets counted but two of these categories were "unspecified", birds and fish. The pets most likely to be found are: Dogs..........104 families Cats.......... 99 families Guinea Pigs... 30 families Fish.......... 50 families Rabbits....... 32 families Birds......... 20 families Amongst the others were 16 horses, chickens, ducks and a slow-worm. Some families own a great many pets. 64 own no pets at all.
